title: Slippy Sea Slug
content:
Slippy Sea Slug is a bait item.

Can be bought from Fishing Supplies in Hopeport for US$3000. Each one lasts for 1 hour of passive activity. Partially used slippy sea slug has its sell value diminished as it is used.

Grants 10 experience per catch, resulting in 1,800 experience and loot worth US$1800 per hour. First time bonus is 500 experience.
